tasks.title: Set up Amazon data collection infrastructure
tasks.description: Research and implement Amazon Product Advertising API or web scraping solution to collect book category data, including titles, categories, prices, reviews, publication dates, and sales rank

tasks.title: Build data processing pipeline
tasks.description: Create background jobs/cron tasks to continuously scrape and update Amazon book data, normalize data formats, and store in database with proper indexing

tasks.title: Implement niche discovery algorithm
tasks.description: Develop core algorithm that analyzes competition (book count, quality metrics), demand (search volume, sales rank trends), and profitability (price points, review patterns) to score and rank niches

tasks.title: Create publishing velocity analyzer
tasks.description: Build module that tracks how many books are published per category over time to identify emerging vs saturated niches

tasks.title: Build seasonal trends analyzer
tasks.description: Implement analysis of seasonal patterns in book categories (e.g., holiday books, back-to-school) to identify timing opportunities

tasks.title: Develop keyword suggestion engine
tasks.description: Create system that extracts and suggests relevant keywords from successful books in each niche, including long-tail variations

tasks.title: Build competition analysis module
tasks.description: Implement detailed competition analysis showing book count, average ratings, review counts, price ranges, and market saturation metrics

tasks.title: Create revenue potential estimator
tasks.description: Develop algorithm that estimates revenue potential based on search volume, competition level, average book prices, and historical sales data patterns

tasks.title: Design user interest/expertise input system
tasks.description: Build UI and backend for users to input their interests, expertise areas, and preferences (multi-select, tags, or free-form input)

tasks.title: Create niche ranking and filtering system
tasks.description: Build algorithm that matches user interests to niches, ranks by profitability score, and allows filtering by competition level, revenue potential, and category

tasks.title: Build niche results dashboard
tasks.description: Design and implement main dashboard showing ranked list of niches with key metrics (competition score, demand score, revenue potential, keyword suggestions)

tasks.title: Create detailed niche view page
tasks.description: Build individual niche detail page showing comprehensive analysis: competition breakdown, keyword list, price analysis, review patterns, seasonal trends, and actionable insights

tasks.title: Implement subscription tiers and pricing
tasks.description: Update Stripe configuration with $29/month (Basic), $59/month (Pro), and $99/month (Premium) plans with feature differentiation

tasks.title: Add feature gating based on subscription tier
tasks.description: Implement middleware/logic to restrict features (e.g., number of niche searches, detailed analytics, export capabilities) based on user subscription level

tasks.title: Build search history and saved niches
tasks.description: Create database models and UI for users to save favorite niches, view search history, and create custom niche lists

tasks.title: Implement export functionality
tasks.description: Add ability to export niche data (CSV, PDF reports) with keyword lists, competition analysis, and recommendations for higher-tier subscribers

tasks.title: Create cover design suggestion feature (expansion)
tasks.description: Build AI-powered or template-based cover design suggestions based on successful covers in the niche

tasks.title: Build title optimization tool (expansion)
tasks.description: Create tool that analyzes successful titles in a niche and suggests optimized titles based on keyword density, length, and proven patterns

tasks.title: Develop launch strategy recommendations (expansion)
tasks.description: Build feature that provides launch strategy suggestions based on niche analysis, including pricing, promotion timing, and marketing approach

tasks.title: Create case studies system
tasks.description: Build database and UI to showcase successful books published using KDP Seek, including before/after metrics and testimonials

tasks.title: Update landing page for KDP Seek
tasks.description: Redesign homepage with value proposition, features, pricing, testimonials, and clear CTAs targeting KDP publishers

tasks.title: Update landing page copy with specific KDP Seek messaging
tasks.description: Rewrite landing page copy to highlight: KDP publishers spend 20+ hours researching niches before writing; KDP Seek automatically scans Amazon data to identify emerging profitable categories with low competition and high demand; showcases specific examples like 'pet training for senior dogs' with 47 quality books and growing search volume; emphasizes time savings (20+ hours â†’ instant results), actionable intelligence (publishing velocity, price points, review patterns, seasonal trends), and expansion features (cover design, title optimization, launch strategy); targets 2+ million active KDP publishers treating this as a business; includes market context ($12B by 2027) and positioning as 'secret weapon that separates profitable publishers from wannabes'

tasks.title: Implement API rate limiting and caching
tasks.description: Add rate limiting for data collection to avoid Amazon API limits, implement caching for frequently accessed niche data to improve performance

tasks.title: Add email notifications
tasks.description: Set up email system to notify users of new niche opportunities, trending categories, or updates to saved niches

tasks.title: Build admin dashboard
tasks.description: Create admin interface to monitor data collection, view analytics, manage users, and manually add/update niche data if needed

metadata.project: KDP Seek - KDP Niche Discovery Tool
